          <title>
            <string language="es-EC">BACK TO THE FUTURE: B (Unit%2B9%2BB%2BConsider%2Bthe%2BConsequences.doc)</string>
          </title>
          <language>es-EC</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es-EC">UNIT 9 PART B1. POSSIBLE CONSEQUENCES Meet a partner discuss with him / her the following subjects and bring to class yours and your partner's opinions. Download attached document below for the interview.   2.  GRAMMAR FOCUSCONDITIONAL SENTENCES with IF CLAUSES    IF PRESENT FUTURE, IMPERATIVE, CAN, MAY If You want to lose weight, You will probably be hungry.If You see her, Tell her to give me a ring.If I have some free time,I may go with you.Study the chart. Observe the structure used to form the conditonal Type 1. 3.Practise Conditional Type 1Interactive practice exercise. Check verb tense. Unit 9 Part B Conditional Type 1Fun and practical questionnaire to check first conditional  Unit 9 Part B: A Questionnaire using Conditional Type 1 Interactive game to relax after checking conditional structure  Unit 9 Part B: A Game with Condiitonal 1 4.  READING & LISTENING COMPREHENSIONTHE IDEAL WOMAN / MANDISCUSSION In a small group, describe the "ideal" partner for you. Think in terms of personality, educational and family background, socioeconomic level, job, and personal values and beliefs. LISTEN to the conversation as many times as necessary.READ and ANSWER  the questions. Press the "Final Score" button to check your quiz.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es-EC">Conditional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es-EC">partner's opinions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es-EC">You</string>
          </keyword>
